# ðŸ“‘ Welcome to Pycotech!

Pycotech offers tools and wrappers to interface with PT-104 PicoLogÂ® Data
 Loggers and files, allowing you to easily build an end-to-end data processing
  pipeline in pure python.
  
This work would not have been possible without **Martin SchrÃ¶der**'s
 amazing wrapper around the usbpt104 c library for the Pico PT-104A RTD Data 
 Acquisition Module. Don't hesitate to head over to his 
 [PT_104 Github repo](https://github.com/trombastic/Pico_PT104) to check out
  the original project and to drop a star! ðŸŒŸ

## ðŸ”¥ Features

Pycotech's suite of utility functions provides seamless integration of
 `.PLW` and `.TXT` files generated by traditional PicoTechnologyÂ® 
 software - allowing you to handle, visualise, and convert between 
 data-formats at will. 
  
Pycotech also provides python command line alternatives to most of the 
 principal PicoLogÂ® software components. Namely, pycotech's 
 `plw-recorder` allows you to bypass the PLW RecorderÂ® data acquisition
  software and gather data directly from a number of PT-104 Data 
  Loggers. Pycotech's `plw-player` substitutes instead the PicoLogÂ® Player
   software, allowing you to read, convert, and extract data from existing
    `.PLW` files.

---

(index/quick-start)=
## ðŸš€ Quick Start

1. ðŸ“š Install pycotech like any other python package, using pip to download it
 from PyPI:

    >```bash
    >pip install pycotech
    >```

2. ðŸ Now test your installation running the following minimal script:

    >```python
    >import pycotech
    >
    >df = pycotech.utils.read_plw("my_plw_file.PLW")
    >
    >print(df)
    >```

3. ðŸŽ‰ If everything went well you are now all set-up to use pycotech! Enjoy!
